raw_comment:
What do you notice: We noticed that on the graph the more Northern areas of it took much longer for leaves to sprout than the more southern areas.
What do you wonder: We wonder what this graph would look like if it were to show how long snow has been in each area.
What Might be going on in this graph: Spring is Coming Slower Than Ever in Northern U.S.! This is supported by how the graph shows the northern areas getting leaves much later than say the southern areas of the U.S.
ace_sentences: The graph shows that leaves sprout later in northern areas than in southern areas.
We wonder what the graph would look like if the graph showed how long snow has been in each area.
Spring is coming slower than ever in the northern U.S.
The graph shows that northern areas get leaves much later than southern areas of the U.S.
